item.description: Due to the Easter weekend conflict, we'll have our April meeting a week early on March 30. Our theme for the dinner is "April Fools." Bring a dish that fits the theme or just bring something normal to help round out what might otherwise be a crazy meal. This event is at a private home, so you must RSVP to receive directions and let the host know what you will be bringing toward the dinner.
item.name: Monthly potluck dinner and business meeting
